title: 1980 -  Fourth Down Behind Bars - Coach of the Year - From gridiron glory to yard-line grit

sources.title: 1980 -  Fourth Down Behind Bars - Coach of the Year - From gridiron glory to yard-line grit
sources.description:
When a former pro faces fourth-and-long behind locked gates, can he turn a lineup of longshots into a comeback classic?
After Chicago Bears alum Jim Brandon returns home using a wheelchair and shut out of coaching, a visit to St. Charles juvenile correctional facility sparks an audacious play: build a real football team. As Jim earns their trust and they find their rhythm, the rematch waiting downfield becomes a shot at pride, purpose, and a scoreboard that finally tilts their way.

Original Title: Coach of the Year (1980) | AKA: Fourth Down Behind Bars, The Coach
